info.description: Retrieves balances, cards and transaction information on accounts
info.title: Holdings Accounts APIs

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the customer

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The identifier of the product

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: limitReference
parameters.description: Identifies the type of limit applicable to the Account

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: bookingDate
parameters.description: The date on which the entry was generated. Normally, but not necessarily, the actual date at the time the entry is generated, e.g. if the previous day's business is still being processed after midnight, the actual date changes, but the run date is still the previous day.

parameters.name: processingDate
parameters.description: The bank date that an accounting movement is applied to the bank GL

parameters.name: valueDate
parameters.description: The applicable value date

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The name used for display purposes

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: cardIssueId
parameters.description: The identifier of the issued card, consisting of three elements. The card type, a full stop and the card number. The card type must be a valid cardType. The card number may be any alphanumeric construction, e.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.description: The identifier of the customer

parameters.name: productId

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: limitReferenceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the limit reference

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

productName.description: The name that is displayed for the product

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

lockedAmount.description: The amount of funds that have been blocked (reserved) for specific purposes

workingBalance.description: For Nostro and Internal Accounts, the same as Online Cleared Balance. For all other accounts it is the cleared balance plus the total of all unapproved debits.

onlineActualBalance.description: Balance of the account that represents total of transactions posted against the account excluding any entries with the processing date in the future.

availableBalance.description: Projected net movements of funds against the account. Depending on the setup in the field AVAILABLE.BAL.UPD in the ACCOUNT.PARAMETER record, may or may not include unauthorised debits, credits, both debits and credits.

sortCode.description: The bank identifier code which identifies both the bank and the branch where the account is held

availableLimit.description: The amount of an allocated credit limit that is available for the nomniated customer to utilise

limitReference.description: Identifies the type of limit applicable to the Account

clearedBalance.description: Total of cleared funds booked against the account. Same as onlineActuaBalance except credit or reversed debit entries with the exposure date in the future.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

bookingDate.description: The date on which the entry was generated. Normally, but not necessarily, the actual date at the time the entry is generated, e.g. if the previous day's business is still being processed after midnight, the actual date changes, but the run date is still the previous day.

transactionTotal.description: The total amount of the transaction

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

cardIssueId.description: The identifier of the issued card, consisting of three elements. The card type, a full stop and the card number. The card type must be a valid cardType. The card number may be any alphanumeric construction, e.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

cardNumber.description: The cardType and number of the card. Card issues are defined with an ID consisting of three elements. The card type, a full stop and the card number. The card type must be a valid cardType. The card number may be any alphanumeric construction, e.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

customerName.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

cardType.description: The type of the card, e.g. Visa, Mastercard, etc.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

status.description: Get a detail status of the specified service/services

fullCardNumber.description: The complete card number including the combination of bank codes, account number and other card convention

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

accountName.description: The name of the account that is displayed

limitReferenceId.description: The identifier of the limit reference

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

workingBalance.description: For Nostro and Internal Accounts, the same as Online Cleared Balance. For all other accounts it is the cleared balance plus the total of all unapproved debits.

ledgerBalance.description: The total of all entries posted against the account excluding any entries with the processing date in the future.

clearedBalance.description: Total of cleared funds booked against the account. Same as onlineActuaBalance except credit or reversed debit entries with the exposure date in the future.

lockedAmount.description: The amount of funds that have been blocked (reserved) for specific purposes

useableBalance.description: Derived from the online cleared balance and represents the total of cleared collected funds posted against the account. Excludes unapproved entries, and credit entries with the exposure date in the future.

interestPropertyName.description: The name that is displayed for the interest property

interestCompoundType.description: The indicator used to specify the method of calculation of compound interest

interestCompoundTypeValue.description: The calculated interest amount using the associated compound interest type

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

paymentTypeName.description: The name that is displayed for the paymentType

paymentMethod.description: The type of method used for the payment

chargeSchedulePaymentValue.description: The amount of the scheduled charge

openActualBalance.description: The actual balance of the account as at the start of the current business day.

availableOverdraftLimit.description: The amount of the unused overdraft limit

approvedOverdraftLimit.description: The ammount of the approved overdraft

limitExpiryDate.description: This field specifies the validity of the Limit, i.e. how long is it to remain in force

outstandingOverdraftLimit.description: The outstanding amount of the overdraft limit

onlineClearedBalance.description: The total of cleared funds booked against the account. Same as onlineActualBalance with the exception of credit or reversed debit entries with the exposure date in the future.

openClearedBalance.description: The cleared balance of the account as at the start of the current business day

accountWithBankBIC.description: BIC of Account with Bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes
